amendment.description: Amendment redirects $10 million in funding within the Transportation Security Administration Aviation Security account for the Federal Flight Deck Officer program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to redirect $10 million in funding within the Transportation Security Administration Aviation Security account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cravaack amendment (A017) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Cravaack amendment (A017) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A017) offered by Mr. Cravaack.
